mapper.select: select id, out_trade_no, state, create_time, total_amount, pay_amount, pay_type, nickname, head_img, user_id, del, update_time, order_type, receiver_address from product_order where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into product_order(out_trade_no, state, create_time, total_amount, pay_amount, pay_type, nickname, head_img, user_id, del, update_time, order_type, receiver_address) values (#{outTradeNo}, #{state}, #{createTime}, #{totalAmount}, #{payAmount}, #{payType}, #{nickname}, #{headImg}, #{userId}, #{del}, #{updateTime}, #{orderType}, #{receiverAddress})

insert into product_order(out_trade_no, state, create_time, total_amount, pay_amount, pay_type, nickname, head_img, user_id, del, update_time, order_type, receiver_address) values
(#{entity.outTradeNo}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.totalAmount}, #{entity.payAmount}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.headImg}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.del}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.orderType}, #{entity.receiverAddress})

insert into product_order(out_trade_no, state, create_time, total_amount, pay_amount, pay_type, nickname, head_img, user_id, del, update_time, order_type, receiver_address) values
(#{entity.outTradeNo}, #{entity.state}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.totalAmount}, #{entity.payAmount}, #{entity.payType}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.headImg}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.del}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.orderType}, #{entity.receiverAddress})
on duplicate key update out_trade_no = values(out_trade_no), state = values(state), create_time = values(create_time), total_amount = values(total_amount), pay_amount = values(pay_amount), pay_type = values(pay_type), nickname = values(nickname), head_img = values(head_img), user_id = values(user_id), del = values(del), update_time = values(update_time), order_type = values(order_type), receiver_address = values(receiver_address)
mapper.update:
update product_order
out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo},
state = #{state},
create_time = #{createTime},
total_amount = #{totalAmount},
pay_amount = #{payAmount},
pay_type = #{payType},
nickname = #{nickname},
head_img = #{headImg},
user_id = #{userId},
del = #{del},
update_time = #{updateTime},
order_type = #{orderType},
receiver_address = #{receiverAddress},
where id = #{id}
